headline: PSE&G Proposes New Solutions To Help Customers Dealing With Upcoming Energy Price Increases
summary: PSE&G today announced that it is amending its May 7, 2025 filing with the New Jersey Board of Public Utilities (BPU) to provide additional short-term relief for mitigating the impact of recent significant increases in electric supply costs caused by PJM's high capacity market prices. In the filing, PSE&G is responding to requests for temporary solutions from Gov. Phil Murphy issued in a press release yesterday, in addition to a one-time waiver of carrying costs for credits that might be issued t
